reviewText: I find show like this really interesting. I only wish there were more episodes in a collection.
Not as entertaining as I had hoped. Too negative and dark.
Shipped timely and no issues. This is a gift for someone, so I am hoping they enjoy it. I know that I like the series.

I Recently got this title for less than half the retail value from one of amazon's sales and upon receiving the product i'm glad i waited. This release seems to be made just for the money. The cover is generic and of low quality on good quality paper, the blu-ray does have disc art but again rushed. I Will be buying volume 2 & 3 because i love the show but my advice is wait till you can get them cheap. There just not worth the $15 price tag that they originally had. I Included a picture of the back so people can read the episodes.
